Text: Sir Tankalot are u a retard or something ? at what point did u decide to switch The Hand, from a full DVD-R to a DVDRip ?! u do realise there are more than 50 people stuck downloading the dvd-r of the Hand at around 48%? what on earth could have caused u to make this switch is beyond me!
